NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Comfash is your platform to collect your fashion and outfits and get inspired.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Capture and upload outfits, edit them with filters or import existing pins from your Pinterest boards
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Compare outfits side-by-side to judge best what to buy and what to wear and support your friends decisions by voting
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
